data_topics_collection.name: Biology
data_topics_collection.description: Data involving any study of living organisms at any scale.

data_topics_collection.name: Cell
data_topics_collection.description: Observations and measurements of cellular physiology and variation in cell types.

data_topics_collection.name: Cheminformatics
data_topics_collection.description: Data regarding the physical properties of chemical compounds.

data_topics_collection.name: Clinical Observations
data_topics_collection.description: All data derived from observations of individual clinical patients, whether as part of a clinical trial or in the course of diagnosis, treatment, and follow-up.

data_topics_collection.name: Data
data_topics_collection.description: Collected information at any stage of processing and analysis.

data_topics_collection.name: Demographics
data_topics_collection.description: Data describing a subset of a population, including sex, age, ethnicity, geographic location, or other factors.

data_topics_collection.name: Disease
data_topics_collection.description: Data describing a disordered health state and its relationships to phenotype, genotype, other organisms, and environmental exposures.

data_topics_collection.name: Drug
data_topics_collection.description: Data regarding the properties of substances intended to be used or investigated for their therapeutic properties.

data_topics_collection.name: EHR
data_topics_collection.description: Electronic health record data, including structured and unstructured text, lab values, and associated metadata.

data_topics_collection.name: EKG
data_topics_collection.description: Measurements of the electrical signals of the heart over time.

data_topics_collection.name: Environment
data_topics_collection.description: Descriptions and measurements of the relationships between people and their ecosystem(s).

data_topics_collection.name: Gene
data_topics_collection.description: One or a select set of DNA sequences, coding or non-coding, and their properties.

data_topics_collection.name: Genome
data_topics_collection.description: One or more complete collections of gene sequences from a single individual, potentially including ony exon sequences.

data_topics_collection.name: Geolocation
data_topics_collection.description: Measurements describing the location of an object or person on planet Earth.

data_topics_collection.name: Image
data_topics_collection.description: Visual representation of an observation, including but not limited to photographs, micrographs, radiology results, or data plots.

data_topics_collection.name: Literature
data_topics_collection.description: The unstructured text contents of a selection of scholarly documents and/or the metadata of those documents.

data_topics_collection.name: Metabolome
data_topics_collection.description: Measurements of the presence, structure, and potential amount of small molecule metabolites within a sample from one individual, cell, organ, sample, or site.

data_topics_collection.name: mHealth
data_topics_collection.description: Mobile health data generated by individuals using health-related mobile applications and devices, concerning location, physical activity, and physiological metrics.

data_topics_collection.name: Microscale Imaging
data_topics_collection.description: Images obtained through microscopy (e.g., optical, fluorescence, electron).

data_topics_collection.name: Molecular Biology
data_topics_collection.description: Any data concerning studies of the structure, function, and interactions of biological molecules.

data_topics_collection.name: Networks and Pathways
data_topics_collection.description: Models of the interactions among biological entities or concepts.

data_topics_collection.name: Neurologic Imaging
data_topics_collection.description: Images obtained through one or more brain imaging techniques, including computed tomography, positron emission tomography, magnetic resonance imaging, or imaging of associated body structures (e.g., angiography).

data_topics_collection.name: Omics
data_topics_collection.description: Data involving two or more comprehensive biomolecular screens, such as those of genomes, transcriptomes, proteomes, or others.

data_topics_collection.name: Ophthalmic Imaging
data_topics_collection.description: Images of the interior and/or exterior of the eye.

data_topics_collection.name: Phenotype
data_topics_collection.description: The set of observable traits of an organism, whether constant or in response to a given set of conditions.

data_topics_collection.name: Protein
data_topics_collection.description: One or a select set of amino acid sequences and their properties.

data_topics_collection.name: Protein Structure Model
data_topics_collection.description: Representations of the three-dimensional structure of a protein in one or more states or conformations.

data_topics_collection.name: Proteome
data_topics_collection.description: Measurements of the presence, sequence, and potential amount of proteins within a sample from one individual, organ, sample, or site.

data_topics_collection.name: SDoH
data_topics_collection.description: Social Determinants of Health, i.e., properties of one or more people contributing to their health, wellness, and disease risk.

data_topics_collection.name: Social Media
data_topics_collection.description: The unstructured text derived from social media correspondence.

data_topics_collection.name: Survey
data_topics_collection.description: Data submitted by members of a study population, usually in response to specific questions.

data_topics_collection.name: Text
data_topics_collection.description: Any unstructured or semi-structured collection of written human language.

data_topics_collection.name: Transcript
data_topics_collection.description: One or a select set of RNA sequences derived from gene expression, and their properties.

data_topics_collection.name: Transcriptome
data_topics_collection.description: Measurements of the presence, sequence, and potential expression level of gene transcripts within a sample from one individual, cell, organ, sample, or site.

data_topics_collection.name: Variant
data_topics_collection.description: An alteration in a gene sequence relative to another set of sequences, whether associated with a phenotype or not.

data_topics_collection.name: Voice
data_topics_collection.description: Audio data produced by human speech, not including non-linguistic utterances.

data_topics_collection.name: Waveform
data_topics_collection.description: Representations of a signal as a function of time, including audio recordings or electrocardiogram readings.
